|brand = BreezeCOM |model = AP-DS.11 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = B11 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = OGD10310308 |icid = 780 102 1699A |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = VLSI;VPS10101-1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM6 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = AMD;AM29F040B-120PC; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 |ram1chip = Alliance;AS7C4096-15JC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = AMD;AM79C961A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 10MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:8B |oui = 00:50:8B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.67 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = parts list |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = b
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = No Wires Needed |manuf_model = Parrot 1100 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = uncommon |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/05/1999 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Netherlands
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Harris;HFA3860; |rad1chip3 = Harris;HFA3624; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Parrot 11Mbps" and "MAC V3.2" is silkscreened on the board. :This access point is a '''[[No Wires Needed]]''' Parrot 1100, like the [[Compaq WL400]].
This device is using a '''[[VLSI]]''' VPS10101-1 ('''Ruby II''' General-Purpose PCMCIA controller w/ 32-bit ARM6 core [http://www.thefreelibrary.com/VLSI+introduces+Ruby+II+PCMCIA+controller.-a016410275 PR]) and an '''[[AMD]]''' Am79C961AKC ISA Ethernet controller. :The [[VLSI]] CPU is presumably handling the MAC + AP functions of this board.
Per the FCC parts list.. *the '''[[VLSI]]''' VPS10101-1 is marked as the CPU *an [http://www.xilinx.com/support/documentation/data_sheets/ds060.pdf '''Xilinx''' Spartan XCS10] (XCS10-3VQ100C) FPGA, not visible on the below board scan - presumably under the RF shield *an additional 128k x 8 SRAM ('''UMC''' UM611024BSW-15), which is not visible on the below board scan. *the RFIC collection is a motley collection '''Harris''''s '''PRISM''' (the original) ICs **'''HFA3860''' (IV) - BBP (BaseBand Processor) **'''HFA3724''' (IN) - QAM (Modulator/Demodulator) **'''HFA3624''' (IA) - RFIC (Prescalar + IF/RF) **'''HFA3524''' (IA) - DS (Digital Synthesizer) **'''HFA3424''' (IB) - LNA (Low Noise Amp) **'''HFA3925''' (IA96) - PA (Power Amp)
{{WiFiCert|W000592|04/10/2000}}
The power adapter included with the device is a '''Sunpower''' MA15-090 (9V, 1.67A).
==Capab/Config== *The device supports 40-bit WEP encryption. *There is no HTTP interface on these devices. *Configuration is meant to be done through SNMP using '''NWN''''s configuration software.
==Links of Interest== *[https://web.archive.org/web/20001212062400/http://www.breezecom.com:80/Products/DS11AccessPoint.html Product page (via archive.org)] *[https://web.archive.org/web/20000901022354/http://www.breezecom.com:80/pdfs/DS11_Brochure899.pdf Datasheet (via archive.org)] :The datasheet notes the antenna connector type as 'Proprietary SMA'. The threading may be non-standard, somewhat like the [[Intel PRO/Wireless 5000 LAN PCI Adapter]]. *[http://www.tomshardware.com/forum/10770-43-search-driver-nowiresneeded-accesspoint ''No Wires Needed Access point'' on '''TomsHardware''' forums]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="Compaq WL400 ([[NWN]] Parrot 1100) board" mode="slideshow"> File:Compaq WL400 board top.jpg|board top File:Compaq WL400 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
